location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no. 52 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Informs Newnham that Assistant Surgeon Henry Johnston has been permitted to proceed to Bombay for the recovery of his health. Encloses a certificate (included) from Assistant Surgeon Morrison of the cruizer Amherststating the necessity of this measure.
